data.text:
Overview

Do you still remember your first love? Was it sweet or bitter? Brave or cowardly? Persistent or abandoned? Regardless of how your first love was, I believe you must have a special feeling for it, an unforgettable emotion. If you want to relive those wonderful memories or experience the charm of first love, then I recommend you to watch a Thai movie called "14 Again: I Love You Two Thousand".

What's 14 à¸­à¸µà¸à¸à¸£à¸±à¹à¸ About

"14 Again: I Love You Two Thousand" is a Thai romantic comedy film released in 2023, directed by Nareubadee Wetchakam and starring Natnicha Navatanawani, Nat Charoen, Inthanon Seangsiripaisarn, and others. The movie tells the story of a young girl named Gib, who escapes back to her hometown from a top university in Bangkok to contemplate her future, telling her mother that she has a school break. Should she strive to graduate and pursue a life that can support her family, or should she chase her own goals and dreams? Along the way, she encounters two boys, Tor, her high school crush, and Gun, her university friend. Whom will she choose? How will she face her first love? These are the themes explored in this movie.

14 à¸­à¸µà¸à¸à¸£à¸±à¹à¸ Information

Release Date: October 12, 2023

Duration: 114 minutes

Genre: Comedy, Romance

Language: Thai

Country: Thailand

Also Known As: 14 Again: I Love You Two Thousand

IMDb Rating: 6.4/10 (59 votes)

Audience Reception About 14 à¸­à¸µà¸à¸à¸£à¸±à¹à¸

After its release in Thailand, this movie received much love and praise from audiences. Some praised it as a touching and heartwarming love story, some praised it for showcasing Thai culture and traditions, and some praised it for evoking memories of their own first loves and youth. Here are some audience comments from IMDb:

"This movie is really good, fun, and heartwarming. I love the chemistry between Gib and Tor, they are adorable and sweet. I also like Gun, he is handsome and caring. I think this movie is suitable for young people because it tells a story about dreams and choices, letting people feel the beauty and dilemmas of first love." (IMDb rating: 10/10)

"I find this movie interesting and very Thai. I like many scenes in the movie, such as Gib returning to her rural hometown, Gib and Tor attending the water festival, Gib and Gun visiting the night market. I think these scenes showcase the charm and culture of Thailand, making people feel comfortable and familiar." (Comment from Douban, rating: 4/5)

"I think this movie is touching and meaningful. I like the themes explored in the movie, about how to face your first love, how to balance your ideals and reality, how to pursue your dreams and beliefs. I think these are important questions that many people will experience and ponder. This movie reminds me of my youth and first love, making me feel sentimental." (IMDb rating: 9/10)

Conclusion

"14 Again: I Love You Two Thousand" is a must-watch Thai movie, featuring a captivating plot, talented actors, and rich Thai culture. It can make you feel the charm of first love and make you contemplate your life choices. If you want to watch a light-hearted, enjoyable, and touching romantic movie, then don't miss this one!
